ComicInfo.Title: Stakeout! Life On Mars
ComicInfo.Series: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency: A Spoon Too Short
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Spoon Too Short sees Dirk Gently take on rhino poaching in Kenya and The Tribe With No Words, while confronting untold secrets from his childhood. The worldâ€™s weirdest detective proves there is no such word as impossible in his dictionary!
